title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\BigQueryOptions
name: BigQueryOptions
description:
Options defining BigQuery table and row identifiers.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.BigQueryOptions

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.identifying_fields
params.description: Table fields that may uniquely identify a row within the table. When actions.saveFindings.outputConfig.table is specified, the values of columns specified here are available in the output table under location.content_locations.record_location.record_key.id_values. Nested fields such as person.birthdate.year are allowed.

params.name: data.rows_limit
params.description: Max number of rows to scan. If the table has more rows than this value, the rest of the rows are omitted. If not set, or if set to 0, all rows will be scanned. Only one of rows_limit and rows_limit_percent can be specified. Cannot be used in conjunction with TimespanConfig.

params.name: data.rows_limit_percent
params.description: Max percentage of rows to scan. The rest are omitted. The number of rows scanned is rounded down. Must be between 0 and 100, inclusively. Both 0 and 100 means no limit. Defaults to 0. Only one of rows_limit and rows_limit_percent can be specified. Cannot be used in conjunction with TimespanConfig.

params.name: data.excluded_fields
params.description: References to fields excluded from scanning. This allows you to skip inspection of entire columns which you know have no findings.

Cannot be used in conjunction with TimespanConfig.
